title: Who Is Carson Hocevar’s Girlfriend? Holley Hollan’s Relationship History

excerpt: Discover who Carson Hocevar's girlfriend is and explore the relationship of these rising stars in the world of NASCAR.

text: Eager to discover who Carson Hocevar’s girlfriend is? The up-and-coming NASCAR driver has captured attention not just for his remarkable performances on the racetrack but also for his expanding influence in the racing community. Along with his professional successes, fans are becoming increasingly interested in his personal life, particularly concerning the woman who stands beside him. Here are all the insights regarding Hocevar’s girlfriend, their bond through motorsports, and how their relationship has developed in the spotlight.. Who is Carson Hocevar’s girlfriend? Carson Hocevar’s girlfriend is Holley Hollan. Holley is a skilled stock car racing driver. She was born on November 8, 2001, in Broken Arrow, Oklahoma, USA, and is the daughter of Harley Hollan, a businessman and racer known for competing mainly in 600cc micro sprints. Holley comes from a long line of racers as a fourth-generation driver and currently competes in the ARCA Menards Series. At five years old, she watched other children race at nearby tracks, which inspired her to start racing junior midget cars. By the time she turned seven, she had advanced to micro sprints, where she achieved multiple victories. Shortly after, she began participating in the USAC National Midget and POWRi Lucas Oil Midget Series from 2019 to 2021. This journey led to impressive accomplishments, including a heat win in USAC and high placements in the rankings. Carson Hocevar and Holley Hollan’s relationship history The details of how the couple first met remain unknown to the public, but they were first spotted together at the 2024 NASCAR Awards in Charlotte on November 22, where they made their red carpet debut as a couple. For the occasion, Carson wore a striped blazer paired with dark grey trousers, while Hollan dazzled in a long red gown. Later, the couple was seen together again when Holley shared pictures on Instagram to celebrate her birthday. On the day she arrived at Phoenix Raceway to cheer on her boyfriend, they posed for several photos. Hollan captioned one of them as celebrating her 23rd birthday and calling it the best birthday weekend in Phoenix, as reported by EssentiallySports. The Instagram post has since been deleted.

Here are all the insights regarding Hocevar’s girlfriend, their bond through motorsports, and how their relationship has developed in the spotlight..

Who is Carson Hocevar’s girlfriend?

Carson Hocevar’s girlfriend is Holley Hollan.

Holley is a skilled stock car racing driver. She was born on November 8, 2001, in Broken Arrow, Oklahoma, USA, and is the daughter of Harley Hollan, a businessman and racer known for competing mainly in 600cc micro sprints.

Holley comes from a long line of racers as a fourth-generation driver and currently competes in the ARCA Menards Series. At five years old, she watched other children race at nearby tracks, which inspired her to start racing junior midget cars.

By the time she turned seven, she had advanced to micro sprints, where she achieved multiple victories. Shortly after, she began participating in the USAC National Midget and POWRi Lucas Oil Midget Series from 2019 to 2021. This journey led to impressive accomplishments, including a heat win in USAC and high placements in the rankings.

Carson Hocevar and Holley Hollan’s relationship history

The details of how the couple first met remain unknown to the public, but they were first spotted together at the 2024 NASCAR Awards in Charlotte on November 22, where they made their red carpet debut as a couple. For the occasion, Carson wore a striped blazer paired with dark grey trousers, while Hollan dazzled in a long red gown.

Later, the couple was seen together again when Holley shared pictures on Instagram to celebrate her birthday. On the day she arrived at Phoenix Raceway to cheer on her boyfriend, they posed for several photos. Hollan captioned one of them as celebrating her 23rd birthday and calling it the best birthday weekend in Phoenix, as reported by EssentiallySports. The Instagram post has since been deleted.
